headline: How Vulcan Materials’ Ninth Straight Dividend Hike At Vulcan Materials (VMC) Has Changed Its Investment Story
summary: Vulcan Materials’ board recently approved a higher quarterly cash dividend of US$0.52 per share, payable on March 23, 2026, to shareholders of record on March 9, 2026, lifting the payout from US$0.49 and marking the ninth straight year of increases. This latest dividend bump, announced just ahead of the company’s closely watched fourth-quarter earnings release, underscores management’s confidence in cash generation even as analysts debate growth, margins, and valuation assumptions through...
